task_text: I'm joining Bellini soon. Where can I read about how time tracking works, and what are the main reasons we track time?

text_blocks: I can see you're accessing from the public website (is_public=true). This means you're not yet logged in as an employee.

input.message:
Welcome to Bellini Coatings! I appreciate your interest as you prepare to join us. However, information about our internal time tracking procedures and policies is part of our internal documentation and is only available to current employees who are logged into our systems.

Once you officially join and receive your employee credentials, you'll be able to access our internal wiki where you can find detailed documentation about time tracking procedures, policies, and the reasons behind our time tracking practices.

If you have any questions before your start date, please reach out to your HR contact or hiring manager who can provide you with relevant onboarding information.
